channel.title: Monster Movement
channel.description:
I cant seem to get my npcs to move in my server, I've set the coords where they are, set the range ect. but they won't budge. I'm also using Spartan-Server.
PS: Is there a way so they can face a different direction other than South?

item.title: Monster Movement
item.dc:creator: @_Worx `Worx
item.description:
@_Worx wrote:

2 years ago from yesterday this topic was made. Brings a tear to your eye doesnt it?

Read full topic

item.title: Monster Movement
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

Zederation:

People say that it is impossible to make NPC’s face a different direction, but there has got to be a way, this is Java we are talking about, the possibilitys are endless, someone please post an answer to the problem with NPCs facing a different direction OK? PLEASE!!! - (It may require a programmer with great knowledge of Java)

Good gravedig oh and its not imposible you just change the default direction in npc.java i think

Read full topic
